definitions.title: i.
definitions.body: = rebuild Jos 6:26, 1Ki 16:34, Am 9:14, Is 45:13, Ps 69:36, Ne 2:5, Da 9:25 all of city; cf. phrase [[בנה חָרְבוֹת עוֹלָם]] Is 58:12, Is 61:4 & Ez Eze 36:36, Mal 1:4, Job 3:14; of walls Mic 7:11, 2Ch 32:5, Ne 2:17, Ne 3:33, Ne 3:35, Ne 3:38, Ne 6:6, Ps 51:20 (act. of ´[[י]]); of gate Ne 3:1, Ne 3:13, Ne 3:14, Ne 3:15; temple Zec 6:12, Zec 6:13, Ezr 1:3; altar 2Ch 33:16 (Qr [[וַיִּבֶן]] so Bö < Kt [[ויכן]], fr. [[כון]], so Öt), Ezr 3:2; high places 2Ki 21:3 = 2Ch 33:3; in some of these apparently an idea of merely repairing; so, sts. with added notion of enlarging etc., city Nu 32:34, Nu 32:37, Nu 32:38 (E) Jos 19:50 (P) Ju Jdg 21:23, 2Ki 14:22 = 2Ch 26:2, 1Ch 11:8, 2Ch 8:2, 2Ch 11:6 cf. Mic 3:10; Millo 1Ki 9:24, 1Ki 11:27; cf. house Job 20:19.
fig.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: build a house ([[בית]]) = perpetuate and establish a family; subj. Leah & Rachel Ru 4:11; subj. a brother De 25:9; subj. ´[[י]] (promise to David) 1Sa 2:35, 2Sa 7:27, 1Ki 11:38, 1Ch 17:10 and 1Ch 17:25; (to Solomon) 1Ki 11:38; cf. further [[סֻכַּת דָּוִד]] Am 9:11 (rebuild, restore); = cause a household to flourish Pr 14:1 cf. opp. Pr 27:18; also of establishing David's throne Ps 89:5.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: build up Israel (after exile) subj. ´[[י]] Je 24:6, Je 31:4, Je 33:7, Je 42:10 cf. Je 45:4 & Ps 28:5; obj. Zion Ps 102:17. †

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: be built, (lit.) of city Nu 13:22; of temple 1Ki 3:2 (´[[לְשֵׁם י]]) 1Ki 6:7, 1Ki 6:7, 1Ki 6:7; (c. acc. mater.); Pt. = to be built (gerundive) 1Ch 22:19.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be rebuilt: of city of Sihon Nu 21:27 cf. Is 25:2, Is 44:26, of wall of Jerusalem Ne 7:1, of Jerusalem Je 30:18, Je 31:4, Je 31:38, Is 44:28 cf. Da 9:25 [[תָּשׁוּב וְנִבְנְתָה]], & Ez Eze 26:14 (c. [[עוֹד]]), of ruinous places ([[הֶחֳרָבוֹת]]) Ez Eze 36:10, Eze 36:33, of a devoted city De 13:17 (c. [[עוֹד]]), of temple Hag 1:2, Zec 1:16, Zec 8:9, indef. subj. Job 12:14.

definitions.title: 2. a.
definitions.body: (fig.) of restored exiles, = established Je 12:16, of prosperous wicked Mal 3:15, of repentant offender Job 22:23.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: established, made permanent, subj. [[חֶסֶד]] Ps 89:3 (c. [[עוֹלָם]]), subj. [[בַּיִת]] Pr 24:3 (by wisdom).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: of childless wife, by means of concubine [[אִבָּנֶה מִמֶּגׇּה]] Ge 16:2, Ge 30:3 I shall be built up, i.e. become the mother of a family, from or through her; cf.
